|                                             | line/Letchworth CSD are controlled by the shunter and in most cases only    |              |
|                                             | one movement at any one time is permitted.                                  |              |

|                                             | proceed towards Letchworth CS Reception; however trains cannot be           |              |

|                                             | line.                                                                       |              |
